/.title: Condoo: Cruise control for condo landlords
/.description: Property management made simple, for all condo landlords. Condoo leverages modern technology to provide institutional quality management at better prices

/login.title: Login to Condoo
/login.description: Login to Condoo to access all of your condo rental information, all at your fingertips.

/signup.title: Get Started with Condoo
/signup.description: Get started with Condoo to access best-in-class condo property management services.

/pricing.title: Condoo | Pricing
/pricing.description: Access Cruise Control by Condoo starting at 9% of gross rent per month.

/about.title: Condoo | About Us
/about.description: Condoo was founded on the insight that residential condo landlords had few options to get the scale necessary to provide high-quality management services at reasonable prices. Needing to rely on self-management, which can be costly without scale, leads to lower rental rates, and consistent interruptions in your daily life.
